name: Argan Oil Face & Body Moisturizer 4oz
description: The Argan Oil Face and Body Moisturizer offers a noticeable difference when it comes to skin health, strength, and vitality. Powered by nutrient-dense Argan Oil, this body oil firms, tones, and enhances collagen while providing long-lasting hydration. Whether you use it in the morning or evening on damp skin after bathing, this powerhouse product leaves your skin feeling smoother, softer, and strengthened from its natural protective barrier. Ideal for all skin types seeking relief - you'll never have to worry about undernourished skin again!  Ingredients: Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Fragrance, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil (Argan Oil), Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice (Aloe Vera), Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Oil, Orbignya Oleifera (Babassu) Seed Oil.
